name: Snakeez
description: SNAKeez is a simple "snake" classic style game but with different physics.Here you have to collect not apples but eggs and snake's tail grows much faster.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: DualCore CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTS250/HD7770 or better Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 Storage: 100 MB available space
